definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: [[אַחַר]] prop. subst. the hinder or following part (cf. the pl.)

definitions.title: 1. adv. a.
definitions.body: of place, behind, twice Ge 22:13 (many MSS. Sam. LXX SyrVer Ol Ew read [[אֶחָד]] v. Di) Ps 68:26.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of time, afterwards Ge 10:18, Ge 18:5, Ge 24:55, Ge 30:21, Ju Jdg 19:5 +; [[וְאַחַר]] in laws of P, as Le 14:8, Le 14:19, Le 15:28, Le 22:7, Nu 5:26 al.

definitions.title: 2. prep. a.
definitions.body: of place, behind, after Ex 3:1, Ex 11:5, 2Ki 11:6, Ct So 2:9, Is 57:8: [[הָלַח אַחַר]] to go after, follow Ge 37:17, 2Ki 13:2, 2Ki 23:3, Is 65:2, Ez Eze 13:3, Job 31:7; [[חָיׇה אַחַר]] 1Sa 12:14; [[מֵאַחַר]] from after † 2Sa 7:8, Ps 78:71, Is 59:13.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of time, after Ge 9:28, Le 25:15 al; [[הָאֵלֶּה אַחַר הַדְּבָרִים]] after  these things † Ge 15:1, Ge 22:1, Ge 39:7, Ge 40:1, 1Ki 17:17, 1Ki 21:1, Ezr 7:1, Es 2:1, Es 3:1; [[אַחַר כֵּן]] † Le 14:36, De 21:13, 1Sa 10:5; [[אַחַר זֶה]] (late) 2Ch 32:9; sq. inf. † Nu 6:19, Je 40:1, 1Ch 2:24, Job 21:3; [[עַד אַחַר]] till after † Ne 13:19.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: Ne 5:15 strangely: Ew RV besides; but text prob. corrupt, v. Be Ry.

definitions.title: conj.
definitions.body: [[אַחַר אֲשֶׁר]] after that Ez Eze 40:1; and without [[אשׁר]] Le 14:43, Je 41:16, Job 42:7. As prep. & conj. the pl. [[אַחֲרֵי]] is much more freq., which in any case must be used before suffixes.

definitions.title: 1. subst.
definitions.body: hinder part †2Sa 2:23 [[בְּאַחֲרֵי הַחֲנִית]] with the hinder end of the spear.

definitions.title: 2. prep. a.
definitions.body: of place, behind, after Ge 18:10 [[וְהוּא אַחֲרָיו]] and it behind him De 11:30, Ju Jdg 5:14, 1Sa 14:13, 1Sa 21:10; Ho 5:8 [[אַחֲרֶיךָ]] Behind thee! (sc. Look or The foe is); with a vb.as [[הִבִּיט]] to look Ge 19:17, 1Sa 24:9, [[הֵנִיעַ ראׁשׁ]] to shake the head 2Ki 19:21 ( = Is 37:22), esp. verbs expressing or implying motion, as [[בָּא]] to enter in (v. Dr 2Sa 20:14) [[בִּעֵר]], [[דָּבֵק]], [[דָּלַק]], [[הָיׇה]], [[הָלַח]], [[מִלֵּא]], [[פָּנׇה]], [[רָדַף]], [[הִשְׁלִיח]] (see these words).

definitions.title: after
definitions.body: Ge 9:9 [[זַרְעֲכֶם אַחֲרֵיכֶם]] your seed after you; similarly Ge 17:7-10, Ge 17:19, Ge 35:12, Ge 48:4, Ex 28:43, Nu 25:13 all P (also De 1:8, De 4:37, De 10:15, 1Sa 24:22, 2Sa 7:12 ‖), & with [[בָּנׇיו]] Ge 18:19 J ( + [[בֵּיתוֹ]]) Ex 29:29 P Le 25:46 H De 4:40, De 12:25, De 12:28, Je 32:18, Je 32:39, 1Ch 28:8, Pr 20:7, [[דּוֹרוֹתֵינוּ]] Jos 22:27, [[בֵּיתוֹ]] Job 21:21; Ex 10:14, Ju Jdg 10:3 etc.; with inf. Ge 5:4 [[אַחֲרֵי הוֹלִידׁוֹ]] after his begetting Sheth, Ge 13:14, Ge 14:17, Ge 18:12, Ge 25:11 + oft.; [[אַחֲרֵי־כֵן]] afterwards Ge 6:4 ([[אחרי]] [[כן אשׁר]] = afterwards, when, cf. 2Ch 35:20) Ge 15:14, Ge 23:19, Ge 25:26, Ge 32:21, Ge 41:31, Ge 45:15 etc.; [[ויהי אחרי־כן]] as a formula of transition chiefly in 2 S (2Sa 2:1 2Sa 8:1 ‖ 2Sa 10:1 ‖ 2Sa 13:1 2Sa 21:18 ‖) cf. 1Sa 24:6, Ju Jdg 16:4, 2Ki 6:24, 2Ch 20:1, 2Ch 24:4 †; in late Heb. [[אַחֲרֵי זאׁת]] † Job 42:16, Ezr 9:10, 2Ch 21:18 ( + [[כָּל־]] 2Ch 35:20 (do.); cf. Aram. [[אַחֲרֵי דְנׇה]] Da 2:29, Da 2:45, and [[בָּאתַר דְּנׇה]] Da 7:6, Da 7:7.—The local (metaph.) and temporal senses blend Ps 49:14 [[וְאַחֲרֵיהֶם בְּפִיהֶם יִרְחוּ]] & after them (i.e. following, imitating them) men applaud their speech, cf. Job 21:33.

definitions.title: 3. conj.
definitions.body: [[אַחֲרֵי אֲשֶׁר]] after that, with the finite vb. De 24:4, Jos 7:8, Jos 9:16, Jos 23:1, Jos 24:20 +; without [[אשׁר]] † Le 25:48, 1Sa 5:9 †. (The most common constr. of [[אחרי]] is as a prep. with the inf. cstr.) Jos 2:7 [[אַחֲרֵי כַּאֲשֶׁר יׇחְֽאוּ]] must be an error, either for [[אחרי אשׁר]] or for [[כאשׁר]] alone (notice [[אחריהם]] twice in the same verse); 2Sa 24:10 rd. [[אַחֲרֵי סָפַר]] vid. Dr.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: [[מֵאַחֲרֵי]]:57, 1Ch 17:7 [[מִן־אַחֲרֵי]] (‖ 2Sa 7:8 [[מֵאַחַר]]); (a) from behind Ge 19:26, 2Sa 2:23; from after i.e. from following after, usually with [[שׁוּב]] or [[סוּר]] 1Sa 24:2, 2Sa 2:22, 2Sa 2:26, 2Sa 2:30, 2Sa 11:15; Jos 22:16, Jos 22:18, Jos 22:23, Jos 22:29, 1Sa 15:11 +; with other vbs. of motion, as [[עָלָה]] 1Sa 14:46, 2Sa 20:2, [[נַעֲלָה]] 2Sa 2:27, [[לָקַח]] Am 7:15, 1Ch 17:7, [[זׇנׇה]] Ho 1:2; pregn. Is 30:21 thy ears shall hear a word [[מֵאַחֲרֶיךָ]] coming from behind thee, Je 9:21 (sc. [[נׇפַל]], see v:a) 1Sa 13:7 LXXL We Dr [[חָֽרְדוּ מֵאַחֲרָיו]] (b) denoting position ([[מן]] = off, on the side of; see [[מן]] behind Ex 14:19, Ex 14:19, Jos 8:2, Jos 8:4, Jos 8:14, 1Ki 10:19, Ne 4:7 ([[מֵאַחֲרֵי לְ]]) 2Ch 13:13 b, (g) of time (rare) † De 29:21, Ec 10:14; [[מֵאַחֲרֵי כֵן]] † 2Sa 3:28, 2Sa 15:1, 2Ch 32:23.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: † [[עַל־אַחֲרֵי]] Ez Eze 41:15 beside, at the back of.
